downloadTitle: Technical Documentation Download for System Center 2012 – Data Protection Manager
downloadDescription: This page lists the technical documentation downloads that are available for the Data Protection Manager component of System Center 2012.
detailsSection:
The downloadable files listed on this page contain the product documentation for the Data Protection Manager component of System Center 2012 Service Pack 1 (SP1). The available downloads include:

  • Complete Technical Documentation for System Center 2012 R2 - Data Protection Manager, last updated October 17, 2013 (pdf & docx)
  • Deployment Guide for System Center 2012 SP1 - Data Protection Manager, last updated January 15, 2013 (pdf & docx)
  • Getting Started Guide for System Center 2012 SP1 - Data Protection Manager, last updated January 15, 2013 (pdf & docx)
  • Operations Guide for System Center 2012 SP1 - Data Protection Manager, last updated January 15, 2013 (pdf & docx)
  • Planning Guide for System Center 2012 SP1 - Data Protection Manager, last updated January 15, 2013 (pdf & docx)
  • Troubleshooting System Center 2012 SP1 - Data Protection Manager, last updated January 15, 2013 (pdf & docx)


This technical documentation is also available in the TechNet Library.
systemRequirementsSection:
• Word Viewer
  • Microsoft Word 2010
  • Microsoft Office Word 2007
  • Microsoft Office Word 2003
  • Microsoft Word 2002
  • Microsoft Word 2000
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button to start the download.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the installation, click Cancel.

relatedResourcesSection.title: technical Documentation for Data Protection Manager in the TechNet Library
